title: Brooch, 1909-1918
markings: On underside; C.H in a rectangle, Chester town mark, sterling, and illegible date possibly 1909.
provenance: 2013, Given to Cooper-Hewitt by owner Harry C. Sigman
dimensions: Height x Length: 1.9 x 4.4 cm (3/4 x 1 3/4 in.)
description: Horizontal brooch in the shape of a butterfly with wings spread; the wing are enameled in iridescent blue and green, the central boy in blue.

tombstone.epitaph: Brooch, 1909-1918.silver, enamel. Gift of Harry C. Sigman. 2013-21-26.
